object_get_parent: This function will get you the object_index of any parent that has been assigned to the specified object, or else return -100 to show that the object has no parent assigned to it, or -1 if the object being checked does not exist. For more information on parents see the section on the Object Editor.
The index of the object to check
The above code will get the parent of the object index for the instance running the code and store the return value in the variable "par".
